snippet: Benihana, the restaurant chain known for its dramatic displays of Japanese cooking, said on Tuesday that it had hired Jefferies & Company to advise on a potential sale of the company.
abstract: Benihana, the restaurant chain known for its dramatic displays of Japanese cooking, said on Tuesday that it had hired Jefferies & Company to advise on a potential sale of the company.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Benihana May Serve Up a Deal
